org.araneaframework.uilib.core
Interface MenuContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseMenuWidget
public interface MenuContext

This interface declares the required methods for menu context that handles a menu. Custom menu contexts should extend the BaseMenuWidget.

Author:
Taimo Peelo (taimo@araneaframework.org)
See Also:
BaseMenuWidget

Field Summary
static String MENU_SELECT_EVENT_KEY
          The event name for the menu selection listener.
static String MENU_VIEWDATA_KEY
          The viewData key that is used for the menu.
 
Method Summary
 MenuItem getMenu()
          Provides access to the (full) menu.
 void selectMenuItem(String menuItemPath)
          Selects (activates) the requested menu item.
 void setMenu(MenuItem menu)
          Specifies the menu to use and show.
